AI-powered email marketing for Shopify

Grow your Shopify revenue in half the time with email gamification, prebuilt automation, and smart segmentation, powered by Mailmodo AI.

Ready to bump up your Shop revenue with emails?

Why choose Mailmodo for Shopify?

Deeper personalization

Be it subject lines or custom email copy, tailor every aspect of an email campaign with Shopify data.

Quicker data sync

Connect your Shopify store with Mailmodo and import all your email campaign data and brand kit in minutes.

Mobile optimization

Create responsive emails for all device sizes and ensure the best user experience and readability.

Real human support

Accelerate your store growth with real human support and expertise via video meet, chats, email, or Slack.

Managed deliverability

Get expert guidance on deliverability best practices and ensure your emails don’t land in spam again

1000+ integrations

Easy integrations with 1000+ tools to sync customer data, store and website data to automate and trigger campaigns

Frequently asked questions

Mailmodo is one of the best email marketing apps for Shopify stores that help grow your e-commerce sales. Mailmodo offers interactive AMP widgets like shopping carts in emails to reduce friction in the checkout process and increase revenue.
You can connect your Shopify store with Mailmodo and start sending email campaigns almost instantly. Mailmodo offers a complete email marketing suite, from email creation to automation, to make email marketing profitable for store owners.
Email automation lets you send personalized emails to your customers based on their activities on your Shopify store.

You can use Mailmodo's email automation platform to send automated emails to your e-commerce customers.

Here's how you can do it:

- Decide your campaign goals.
- Sign up for Mailmodo.
- Import and segment your contact list.
- Set up automation triggers.
- Create your email template/edit the premade designs.
- Initiate the campaign.


Learn in detail about setting up automation on Mailmodo.
You can send welcome emails, newsletters, product catalogs, order confirmation emails, abandoned cart emails, win-back emails, re-engagement emails, feedback emails, and so much more.
Yes, Mailmodo offers seamless integration with Shopify stores. You can connect our email marketing app with your store within a few clicks and start sending campaigns.
Mailmodo's email marketing platform is the most affordable solution that you can use to grow the revenue of your Shopify store. Feel free to check out our pricing plans here.
